mapper.select: select id, name, costprice, saleprice, type_id, resources, state, offsaletime, onsaletime, createtime, shop_id, user_id, search_master_msg_id from t_pet where id = #{id}

select * from t_pet
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_pet(name, costprice, saleprice, type_id, resources, state, offsaletime, onsaletime, createtime, shop_id, user_id, search_master_msg_id) values (#{name}, #{costprice}, #{saleprice}, #{typeId}, #{resources}, #{state}, #{offsaletime}, #{onsaletime}, #{createtime}, #{shopId}, #{userId}, #{searchMasterMsgId})

insert into t_pet(name, costprice, saleprice, type_id, resources, state, offsaletime, onsaletime, createtime, shop_id, user_id, search_master_msg_id) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.costprice}, #{entity.saleprice}, #{entity.typeId}, #{entity.resources}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.offsaletime}, #{entity.onsaletime}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.shopId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.searchMasterMsgId})

insert into t_pet(name, costprice, saleprice, type_id, resources, state, offsaletime, onsaletime, createtime, shop_id, user_id, search_master_msg_id) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.costprice}, #{entity.saleprice}, #{entity.typeId}, #{entity.resources}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.offsaletime}, #{entity.onsaletime}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.shopId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.searchMasterMsgId})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), costprice = values(costprice), saleprice = values(saleprice), type_id = values(type_id), resources = values(resources), state = values(state), offsaletime = values(offsaletime), onsaletime = values(onsaletime), createtime = values(createtime), shop_id = values(shop_id), user_id = values(user_id), search_master_msg_id = values(search_master_msg_id)
mapper.update:
update t_pet
name = #{name},
costprice = #{costprice},
saleprice = #{saleprice},
type_id = #{typeId},
resources = #{resources},
state = #{state},
offsaletime = #{offsaletime},
onsaletime = #{onsaletime},
createtime = #{createtime},
shop_id = #{shopId},
user_id = #{userId},
search_master_msg_id = #{searchMasterMsgId},
where id = #{id}
